SELECT r.rno, r.bkno, b.bkwrite, b.bkimg, b.bkname, r.rsdate, r.rddate, r.rdel, (select count(*) from rental where mid = #{mid} AND rdel = 1) as count FROM rental r LEFT JOIN books b ON r.bkno = b.bkno WHERE r.mid = #{mid} AND r.rdel = 1 order by r.rsdate DESC
